column2: Not all capital gains are treated equally. The tax rate can vary between short-term and long-term gains. Learn about both types in this tax guide.
column4: A Guide to the Capital Gains Tax Rate: Short-term vs. Long-term Capital Gains Taxes

column2: At least 26 publicly traded companies hold bitcoin, including automakers, video game developers, fossil fuel investors, mortgage lenders, insurers, and one massive whale that owns 56% of all corporate crypto.
column4: The biggest corporate holder of bitcoin is not Square or Tesla
